title: Thai Island Escape on Tropical Koh Jum
description: Cast yourself away for a Thai island experience like no other staying at the eco-chic Koh Jum Beach Villas, a boutique property located on the beachfront of the tropical island of Koh Jum (off the coast of Krabi). Includes private return airport transfers, daily breakfast, exotic dining experiences, daily massages, nightly cocktails, a bottle of wine and more.
offer_address: 320/29 M. 3, Koh Sriboya, Nua Klong, Krabi 81130, Thailand
